rev.desc.rev.desc: Error message pop up unexpectedly after add new import descriptor
change if (delim.type in $L.db.import="tab") then ($L.delim="") to if (delim.type in $L.db.import="tab") then ($L.delim="\\t")
removed file.name portion of the query for format control since the name specified is the format control record we want regardless of file.name
Allow fieldnames of $skip - used for importing to arrays of structures with format control
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
Added code to convert old time fields (time.inc, time.length, time.start) to new date/time field (date.format).
Moved validation code out of file.import.new.wizard

descript.descript: Error message pop up unexpectedly after add new import descriptor
change if (delim.type in $L.db.import="tab") then ($L.delim="") to if (delim.type in $L.db.import="tab") then ($L.delim="\\t")
removed file.name portion of the query for format control since the name specified is the format control record we want regardless of file.name
Allow fieldnames of $skip - used for importing to arrays of structures with format control
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
Added code to convert old time fields (time.inc, time.length, time.start) to new date/time field (date.format).
Moved validation code out of file.import.new.wizard
